body.body: Inspect the key in the crankshaft for damage and distortion. Replace the key if necessary.
Inspect the rotor for damage and high spots to the taper centre. Replace the rotor if necessary.
Inspect the stator for signs of overheating and short/open circuits. Replace as necessary.

title: Alternator - Inspection
